name: Self Tan Classic Bronzing Mousse
about: What it is:.What it is formulated to do:.What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: -100 Percent Natural DHA: Tanning agent....Water, Dihydroxyacetone, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Ethoxydiglycol, Coco-Glucoside, Caramel, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum, Sodium Metabisulfite, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tocopherol, Decylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, d-limonene, Anisyl Alcohol, Sodium Hydroxide, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, CI 14700 (Red 4), CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 42090 (Blue 1).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturize any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles, and feet...-For best results, apply using the Tan Applicator Mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. For your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the mitt over your hands and feet. ..-Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. ..-Allow four to eight hours before showering to reveal your developed tan...-To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturize daily, exfoliate regularly, and reapply as desired....Precautions:.-Carry out a patch test 24 hours before use. ..-External use only. ..-Don’t apply to broken or irritated skin. ..-Stop if irritation occurs. ..-Self tan may stain. ..-Avoid contact with eyes or lips and rinse if contact occurs. ..-Sun safety warning: this product does not contain a sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After trying many different brands of tan this one is by FAR my favourite. The colour, the smell, the wearing time. Everything!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shocked to see all the bad reviews! I am a first time self tanner (other than HS prom, so it’s been a minute - way more options on the market nowadays!) and decided to go with this one and am so happy I did. It gives a nice warm glow without having orange or green undertones!

this used to be my favorite self tanner but now it’s terrible. if you’re going to change the formula so drastically, you might as well discontinue this product. what was once green toned is now red toned, my sheets are stained pink, my “tan” is splotchy and barely developed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t buy from Sephora. It was green and the manufacturer told me it was 2 YEARS old. My Sephora told me to use it and it would turn brown. It didn’t.  I was the not so jolly green giant! I had to go to a salon and pay over 100 for a scrubbing treatment that didn’t fully work. I called the company and they replaced the can but didn’t cover cost of treatment. I’ll never buy this product again. Why do they have 2 year old product on shelves anyway!?!
Sephora sent me an EMPTY BOTTLE. Don’t purchase here.

reviews.review_title: Didn’t tan at all… I was still WHITE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Transfer, transfer, transfer! I have fair skin, I love the color, no streaking when using a mit and minimal smell. Putting it on before bed is a no-no (say goodbye to your bed sheets). Letting the product develop for a few hours and washing off helps a lot w/ transfer but its not 100%. I would never feel comfortable siting on light colored furniture or car seats and white garments are a nice shade of orange after wearing. Wash them quickly because the coloring will become permanent if garments are neglected

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm liking this for quite a few reasons. It's easy to apply - much easier than the lotion and dries pretty quickly (less than 2 minutes on my skin). Not pricey, maybe a bit more than other tanning lotions and products but it's definitely worth paying that small amount extra as when comparing it to other brands; this product has the least streaking and most natural looking color, not orange, just a nice golden hue. Bonus: there is no funny smell left on your skin once you have washed it off.  I find one full bottle lasts me for approximately 6 full body applications which makes it more than worth it for me. It is very much on the 'chemical' side which is the only reason I haven't given it a full 5 stars, but if you're not overly concerned about that kind of thing then definitely give this a try.  ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: ‘Peter Thomas Roth’ – Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. reviews.review_text: This self-tanner is AMAZING! It works incredibly well, and FAST! Which is amazing because you are able to quickly see spots missed. It leaves a natural color and can be built up over a couple of days.

Personally I give it a 6/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so I’m fairly new to self tanning. I tried the Isle of Paradise mousse and for whatever reason I could NEVER get it to be even on my skin! I have very very (like VERY) fair skin (Irish and Scottish descent) and it would always be splotchy and uneven after I properly prepped with moisturizer and exfoliation. I was in the Sephora store about the try the Isle of Paradise tanning water and a lady behind me in line told me to try this product line instead. This St. Tropez mousse worked so much better for my skin. It was more natural, smelled better and less than the Isle of Paradise stuff and also developed way quicker. The one complaint I have is that it does transfer to clothes and fabrics so be careful about that when you are processing. Otherwise, this is a product I will continue to buy!

reviews.review_text: I’ve used many different tanning mousses and this is my favorite rn. It’s definitely more moisturizing than others which is great for more mature skin.

reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years. Gives awesome color and if you maintain by taking care of your skin and it’s hydration, it will last much longer than others out there.

reviews.review_title: I’m light skin Hispanic and it made me look orange

reviews.review_text: Was excited but disappointed, no streaks was perfectly even but it was a little too orange for me, I felt too warm, I wish it was a little cooler, but with the same depth of shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works well! Kind of ichy and a bit sticky but the smell was good. I recommend this product for intermediate level self tanners.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Had to finally write a review because I love this product and the reviews here are not that good. I’ve tried several of St. Tropez tanning products and this is my favorite one for my skin tone. Easy to apply, lasts a few days even with working out. I have pretty pale skin if that helps anyone. Dries quickly and the smell is fine but best to rinse off after the 8 hours of developing are up. To be honest it starts working in less than 2 hours for me so very impressed! Also lasts forever… I use it every Friday for the weekend since I workout during the week and I don’t want to waste it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty similar to most self tanners except it really didn’t last as long as I hoped. I always prep my skin before using self tanner by exfoliating and moisturizing and then also keeping my skin hydrated and moisturized to sustain the tan. Even keeping my skin moisturized didn’t help maintain this tan though. After showering just once, without exfoliating or scrubbing my skin, it became extremely patchy and crusty looking so I’m disappointed. Overall, the even, natural looking tan only lasted just over a day, not impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great for us super white folk. blends like a dream, looks natural. in comparison to some cheaper brands though, not a big difference. sol by jergens water foam is an exact dupe. this does last a long time though and i use it daily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried multiple St. Tropez products and cannot get myself to like them. My friend bought me this self tan mousse as a gift and it didn't work for me. It gave me a greenish undertone which I hated. Also there was a ton of transfer on my bed sheets. Compared to other self tans I have used, this one felt more wet and sticky. The only plus I will say is there is a slight immediate tan when you first put it on, which is nice if you need some color right away.

reviews.review_title: The best Mousse, but not the best St.Tropez Produc
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used St.Tropez Mousse for years now, as I have found it to be the best at home tanning routine. This mousse is easy to apply (with the tanning mitt), doesn't streak, and gives the most natural shade. I normally leave it on over night and rinse in the morning. It never stains my bedsheets but it does have a bad smell to it. I prefer their gradual tanning cream as it is just as effective without the smell and waiting time, but I like this product as well.

reviews.review_title: Easy for Beginners to Apply; Deep & Lasting Color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually just live with my super fair complexion but sometimes a gal just wants a tan! What I loved about this product was how easy it was to get a streak-free tan. First, it is easy to see where I applied it. Keep rubbing the product in using circular upward strokes -- avoiding elbows, knees, and ankles until you have massaged most of the product in. Then swipe your mitt across those areas (without any additional product, just what is left on the mitt).Do the same on your face -- no new product on the mitt, just circular upward motions across your entire face with what is left on the mitt. It dries pretty quickly so within 20 minutes I have applied to my body and put PJs on. Not sticky and very little odor. I shower in the morning and enjoy 5-7 days of gorgeous color that fades 'naturally'. I am addicted!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product works well if you follow the directions and use a foam mitt with it. I have used lotions in the past, and this is much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been getting sprayed tans for years but I was a little hesitant to make the switch to do it myself. This tanner is perfect for any newbies. I am fair (makeup shade -makeup forever R230) and the undertones of this color are extremely natural. I don’t do my face and it still blends beautifully. My only cons would be is it probably only lasts 4-6 days in my experience not 10. But I actually really appreciate that. If you’ve ever gone thru a bad tan that you want off you know you. I would say this color is only for light or fair people. Using the glove is a must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best self tan product ever. Recvd as a gift; bought for myself; then bought for my granddaughter. Nice even tan without streaking and doesn't rub off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gives a good color, but every little drop of anything wet will  mess up your tan. When it wears off, it is quite patchy.

reviews.review_title: tried so many of the rest, this is the best!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am not one to write reviews but had to for this. Tl;dr: this product works, looks natural, and is better than any of the others I’ve tried.    Before purchasing, I read so many reviews for self tan products. I’m really impressed with how this turned out. I’ve been using it for about a month now.   The color is very natural and is not orange at all. I am very pale and haven’t been outside much in the last year and a half because of the pandemic so you can only imagine how pale I must be. This did not stain anything.  It dries very quickly but not so quickly you can’t rub it in properly.   I really recommend getting the application and exfoliating minutes. They helped a lot. The application mitt is like a soft chamois cloth that helps evenly apply better than hands do. Color lasts for a week or so.   It helps to do it in the morning so you can do  a rinse off later as it does have a bit of a strange smell but not perfumey or overpowering, just the self tan smell.

reviews.review_title: great at home option for a spray tan
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A friend gifted me the travel size so I could test it out and I loved it so much I bought the larger size. A summer staple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had never used a self tanner until I tried this and I am hooked. It applies so well when used with the mitt and the color is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product but it dries my skin out so much. I think I could’ve gone for a color darker, since I don’t always see much difference everywhere. It does dry up nicely and come off nicely (if you’ve applied it properly). I’ve applied it without scrubbing and lotioning dry parts of my skin (elbows, feet, armpits), but then it does get patchy, but this is with any self tanner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this stuff, but it's awful. It's beautiful when it's freshly applied. It gives a beautiful golden glow, which is why I gave it 2 stars. BUT. It transfers so bad. I felt like it NEVERRR dried so transfer was even easier/more likely. It doesn't last long at all. It starts to fade very quick, and when it does, it comes off very patchy. Will not buy again. I used almost the whole bottle trying to love it or see if there was a better way to apply, etc. but WHEW. I'm done with it. Lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: great self tanner the only problem i have is the pump isn’t all that great at keeping the product in when not in use, mine leaks pretty bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for 2 years and I love it. I don’t like to go tanning but I also don’t like being so pale. I usually use it every 2 days to keep my tan up. You have to buy the mitt if you want it to be an even streak free tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this from shoppers but had to write a review. I never self tan but this stuff is amazing, the mit is great at not streaking the product and evenly distributing the mousse. I've found that if I apply it in the morning and let it set all day, it doesn't rub onto my sheets. Honestly never thought I would be self-tanning but this stuff is like magic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I researched a variety of sunless tanning products and decided on the Classic Bronzing Mousse. I am very happy with the results. The color came out much more natural than the basic store bought brands I had tried in the past. I bought the suggested application glove and didn’t experience streaks or unevenness.  My only concern is that it transferred a ton of color to my white comforter, days after application on my legs. It didn’t stain and this may be a typical problem with all sunless tanning products. But I am concerned that the color of my comforter will eventually change after a full summer of use.

reviews.review_title: Dependable to give a brown tan
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many self tanners, but this has been my favorite for 3 years now. I actually never use the foam application pad like most people, although it works great. I put on medical gloves that fit snug, and mix it with a little lotion and rub it on one leg at a time until it is perfectly blended. I never have streaks as long as I mix it with a little lotion and blend blend blend until it is all absorbed. If I were to try this method without the lotion I would definitely have streaks. The drying time is a little bit longer just to be sure the product is absorbed, but I've never had any issues and the product lasts me much longer than if I use the pad. This gives a brown tan, never orange. I normally tan fairly easily, so this looks just like my own natural tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this self tanner! I’ve tried lots of different brands/types of self tanner and I’d say this one is one of the best so far. Left minimal streaks and the overall tan lasted about a week

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far this is my favorite tanner ive tried. It dries down pretty well so if you tan at night you dont have that sticky feeling. The smell of the tan isnt bad and once you wash it off it doesnt have that tanning odor. The tan is a really nice neutral tan so its not too orange. It gives you a pretty dark tan too. Im quite fair and i can get into a medium color range. It lasts more than a week but i prefer to redo my tan typically once a week during the summer. Ive gone two weeks tho. It fades very well. Its not patchy at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this tanning mousse. The color comes out so nice, and it fades well over time.   Like any self tanner, the application takes some planning: - I won’t sleep in this stuff; it will tan my white sheets, which I don’t want  - I also don’t want to shower too early after applying, so I always avoid putting on too close to bedtime - And I don’t want to put it on so early that I’m smelling like tanning mousse all day (my husband says it’s a weird smell lol)  I usually try to put it on three hours before showering, and I wear a black robe around the house while it sets so I don’t stain clothes. Color comes out perfect, and I don’t end up staining anything! Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this twice and both times I did not get any colour  from the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was easy to apply and the colour is dark and not streaky but I didn’t like that when I showered the next day you could see the colour coming off and it got on my sheets. I’ve gotten this brand before but the classic gradual mousse which I think I prefer more since it doesn’t transfer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried a few drugstore self tanners before and always came out soooo streaky, so I was hesitant about if the “better” self tanners would still actually work. I am now a believer! My tan looked flawless and natural on my first try. I shaved and exfoliated the night before, moisturized, and then used a mitt to apply at night before bed and rinsed it off in the morning. I got a bunch of compliments on my glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought a bottle to try it out and when I started applying it I noticed that the mousse was dark green in color . There was no brown tint in it at all. The guard went on green as well at which point I decided not to risk and to throw it out . What a garbage purchase . It’s either expired or spoiled and under no circumstances should Sephora be selling an expired product . Very disappointed in the brand and in Sephora .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never had as much success with self-tanners as with this one. Its easy to apply, and it gives a really nice natural-looking tone to my skin. I apply it with the mitt, in circular motions, and leave it for 4-6 hours. From my experience, it absorbs so much better than a salon spray tan, doesn’t leave any streaks, doesn’t dry out my skin as much as salon spray tans do, not as strong smelling and just looks great. Also, my tan doesn’t look “orange” with this one unlike after a spray tan. Exfoliating skin prior and moisturizing further after the tan, of course, would be a must to achieve the best result.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As good as you’ve heard. I HATE self tanners. All of them are so temperamental but this one is legit. Just do the prep work. Don’t skip exfoliation. Oh! And the mitts makes it really easy to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's the best at home self tanner I've ever used. During my wedding I used St Tropez while my bridesmaid paid for a professional tan and the St Tropez looked more natural. I get a ton of compliments when I add it to my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail self tanner for as long as I can remember. I have very fair skin with freckles- this never streaks and is a natural tan color for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love everything about this product. Such a natural colour. It goes on so smooth and is so easy to work with...  It would be even easier to work with if it came with a mitt ! *ATTENTION: DOES NOT COME WITH MITT*  For some reason I swore it did , so I chucked my old dirty one and was looking forward to a fresh one ! Lol not a huge deal , but just heads up !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really can’t say enough good things about this self tanner!! I am a newbie and I was so impressed that it didn’t transfer onto my sheets or clothes.  This stuff dries instantly. I already have olive skin tone and this gave me a glow.  I feel like I will have to go darker to get more of a change in my actual skin tone.  I have experienced no irritation with use either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this! Shows up evenly and with a very natural, flattering hue. Makes my legs look great and lasts longer than I would have thought. A favorite summer product!

reviews.review_title: no colour and forever to dry
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointed with this product. An hour after application and it’s still wet and tacky. Basically no colour and what I do get comes off in the first post 8hour wash. Such a waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gives a nice lasting tan. Would definitely recommend this. Has a nice smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Popular for a reason. Have tried maybe 20 self tanning products over last 4ish years. This one has it all. Good color. Easy application with mitt. Neutral smell (no coconut or heavy flowers, which is a personal turnoff). Dries reasonably quickly. There is the DHA smell as it develops, but I apply before bed, dry off in front of a fan, sleep in a thick sheet that absorbs most of the smell. Wake up and shower off to even color. I am short and summer isn't long where I live so the $30 lasts a couple months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good self tan. It applies easily and I find it very forgiving, though it does take some trial and error to get the hang of it. I can usually get a good 4-5 days of colour before it noticeably begins to fade, and it doesn't come off too patchy. The claim that there is no fake tan smell is completely false, and while I don't mind the smell and it can be covered, it's definitely there. The price is steep, but if you're not applying it every few days, the bottle lasts a pretty long time. This is an olive tan, but I find that it comes out quite warm on my skin, probably due to how pale and pink I am. I wish it was more neutral, but it isn't orange or fake looking. The colour is fairly subtle, only about two shades darker than my natural skin. I've used it on my face and the results have been good, though you need to be careful because it can look somewhat off if you overdo it. I'll try the darker colour next, but all in all if you can stomach the price, this product delivers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually love this product, but this bottle is already oxidized (green). That means it's either old or was exposed to too much heat. Returning to purchase in store and get a fresher one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you don’t have olive undertones to your skin tone- STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT.  I have a pretty good base tan and tan very well however my skin tone has more of reddish-pinkish tone to it. This self tanner has extreme green/olive tones to it and makes me look like an alien. So disappointing because I have so many friends that rave about this product. If only they could add more neutral tones and a PH balancer to have it develop according to the user’s natural skintone, or come out with undertones for everyone.  Needless to say, I don’t recommend this product at all :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! I have suuuper light skin and this is saving my life. Make sure to moisturize and exfoliate before applying and you’re good to go! The color is natural and if you follow the instructions it’ll last.

reviews.review_title: Nice and golden but not dark enough for me :)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great tan solution if you’re fair skin or just getting into the tanning world. It gives you a nice glow without the orange but if you’re an avid tanner who wants to be dark I would highly recommend the dark mousse!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are so many things I love about this self tanner. I love that it has a natural looking bronze colour to it, it doesn't have as much runoff as other products similar to it on the market, when applying you can tell immediately where a streak might turn up and can prevent that from happening by smoothing it out with the applicator mitt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this tanning mousse. I’m usually a tanning bed person but lately I’ve wanted to get darker faster and not have to go into a bed everyday to achieve that color. I bought multiple St. Tropez products and landed on this one to try out the first time around to see if I would even like self tanner. It was very easy to use and the color came out great! I bought the mitt and moisturizer that St. Tropez recommends you use. I put the moisturizer on my elbows, feet, hands, and knees and the color developed beautifully in those areas. It doesn’t smell and it really doesn’t transfer on clothes. I actually liked it a lot better than when I get spray tans (no orange feet or hands). I did two coats and I’m glad I did cause it’s not the darkest but for a first timer I was ok with the color it developed over night. Will definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So great and easy to use (I used a tanning mitt which definitely helped), gave me the color I wanted and no bad smell. I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great product , color was not orangey it looked very natural. The only thing is it takes some practice to a apply so it won’t be streaky, the application mit is sold separately but if you take your time in applying the product and wait the time before getting dressed you will be happy with the natural looking glowing results. It’s important to exfoliate the skin and moisturize before applying. Lasts maybe 3-4 showers . Definitely worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great self tanner. I apply this with the St. Tropez mit and it’s great. This product gives a very natural streak free tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Natural looking tan, I use every summer and happy with the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is my HG of self-tanners! Never orange, easy to use and not streaky. I have tried many other self tanners and always come back to this one. I can’t use this brand on my face, which is why I rated it 4 stars instead of 5. I usually use something formulated for the face, because this one gave me really weird gross blackheads. The smell is somewhat sourish as well. Reminds me of buttermilk. But honestly, as far as what kind of tan you’ll end up with, it’s the best of the best. I’m naturally pretty fair skinned, and with 2 applications (one day apart) of St. Tropez I look like I’ve been working hard on a summer tan, without damaging my skin in the process. Get it, you won’t be sorry. Make sure to buy the tanning mitt as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ah I love this stuff. My average shade is Fenty 420 and I wanted to be darker for the summer. I was skeptical how this would work on already deeper skin. It was amazing! It’s transfer resistant and dries fast. When I showered some did rinse off but the tan color did not fade. I highly recommend and it applies easily with the mitt. Very happy with purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is incredibly easy to use (especially for beginners) and provides skin with a natural bronze glow. The trick really is to exfoliate and moisturize big time before applying. I'd recommend purchasing a better applicator mit than the St. Tropez one (I bought the Gaiyah set on Amazon) and buff, buff, buff then, when you think you've buffed enough, buff some more and you'll be left with a beautiful, streak-free finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was the first self-tanning product I ever tried, and used it along with the St. Tropez glove. I felt it gave me a natural tan, but I didn’t really feel like glowing goddess.  It was subtle and not as warm as I would of liked. It looked more of a cool brown over a golden brown, which I didn’t really like.   I’m not sure if I was supposed to do this (it does say use as desired on the bottle), but after using this product I used it again 2 days later, and I got small red, itchy bumps all over my arms and legs. So this product did irritate my skin a bit.   Will use the rest of it but probably won’t repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Giving it 3 stars cause it does streak and the tint color the product claims is there to help apply it evenly was so light compared to my actual skin color that I could barely see it. The good news is the resulting tan wasn’t too dark so the streaking wasn’t extremely noticeable. I just went over again and hopefully the second round does the trick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical because naturally I can get pretty tan on my own, but this just sped up the process! Not too orange but you do get a warmer undertone as opposed to a greyish tan. Still, I've had this on my skin for three days now and you can still see it! Great option if you don't wanna spend 60$ on a spray tan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this self tanner for 8 years. It’s the best on the market. So easy to apply and no streaks. It looks so natural!!!! It does transfers on clothes even after showering so beware if wearing white.
This product wasn’t even that great left me looking dirty -_-

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing.  This product came recommended by a store associate. I’m always a little hesitant to you self Tanners because my skin is so fair and I end up looking like a giant orange. When used with the mitt it goes on beautifully and it looks so natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first ever self tanner I’ve ever tried and still remains the best to this day. I have probably tried over 20 self tanners and I always go back to this one. It has amazing coverage and gives a dark tan glowing tan.

reviews.review_title: From airbrush tans to at-home St. Tropez
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In college I used to go to the same women for airbrushed spray tans for all of my big events. Since moving, I decided to try this product. I definitely liked the tone and depth of my airbrush tans better, but the St. Tropez is pretty decent for at home applications. Make sure to exfoliate 24 hours before (I make an easy DIY scrub with sugar and olive oil), moisturize your elbows, knees, ankles wrists right before applying and use the mitt like everyone says. In terms of the color, it isn't as dark as I expected after one application, however, you could definitely reapply a couple days in a row to intensify. Also, the guide color went on with a pretty olive undertone, however I was a little disappointed after my first shower as the olive washes out and your left with more of a warm tone. And last thing, once you wash off the guide color, this tan does not transfer on sheets and its not sticky on your skin at all!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buy a mitt to apply this! It’s the absolute best self tanner ever. Moisturize dry areas (your elbows, knees, tops of toes and tops of fingers) before applying. I have a medium skin tone and one application of this overnight helps me in the winter, or 2-3 nights gives me a glow like I just got back from a beach. Incredible product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works great-i apply directly after shower and shaving/ exfoliating. Waiting the suggested 24hrs tends to result in it washing away

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well, this tanner ruined my white sheets even though I waited several hours to lay down after application, and I woke up with super streaky/stained skin (I applied it with the St. Tropez Mitt). Also, it might smell good on application but about an hour later it starts stinking very strongly. I am giving it 1 star because the color looks natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After a terrible spray tan incident years ago, I have shunned any and all fake tanning products. Finally I decided to give it another shot. I am very fair. This tanner is so natural looking.  It doesn’t look orange on me at all. It blends so well that I can even just tan certain areas without looking weird. Stays on for a good amount of time. Easy to apply. Getting the harder areas like hands and feet takes some trial and error but I’m so pleased with this stuff. I can look just a little more bronzed with one coat or make more of a difference with more. It’s a great pick me up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this bronzing mousse! I’m extremely pale and this makes my skin look amazing!!!! I apply in the morning (2 layers to achieve my desired results) and leave it on for at least 8 hours then shower that night and by the next morning my body is perfectly tanned! Love this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Highly recommend, I use to avidly tan and realized the damaged it caused my skin. This is an awesome alternative, great color. Only downside is the strong initial smell of fake tan and it rubs off on cloths after a sweaty night out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this bronzing mousse! I have pale skin so the classic mousse was perfect for me. It gave me a nice glowing tan that didn’t appear orange or too dark and unnatural for my super light skin. I will continue to use this all summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing!! After only 2 applications I have a golden tan on my legs that now matches the natural tan on my arms. Love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really scared to try self-tanning when I started periodically using this product a year ago, but St. Tropez makes it really easy. I typically only use it during the warmer months or for specific occasions. It fades very evenly, lasts pretty long, and looks very natural for a self-tanner. The first time I tried it last year, my coworker--who I see all the time--asked if I had been on vacation! I'll also mention that I don't like to use this product with St. Tropez's specific application glove because it breaks really easily and the material isn't ideal. I use another brand of tanning glove with a more velour material to put this product on, and in my experience, it makes a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This products smells horrible after a couple hours.  Also I was covered in streaks even though I followed all instructions.  Fortunately most of it washed off in the first shower but I was very disappointed especially after reading so many great reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Used to be a big fan of XenTan but so glad I switched to this! Smells SO much better and develops buildable tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I snagged this in a value set after Christmas on sale. It sat in my cabinet until everything was closed, and my spray tan went bye bye. I tried this for the first time with the St. Tropez glove and it looked so good! Natural, not orange, and no streaks even though I am a new self tanner. I applied it so quickly and easily that I thought missed something. It held up to one light shave without fading and now has faded gracefully after 6-7 days. It is very natural so if you’re looking for something really dark, I would get their darker colors. I am pretty pale and it made me look like I got back from vacation.   Tip: if you got a little too much on hands or ankles, use an exfoliating glove/mitt and lightly buff until it’s blended. It does work for the classic color, but may be more difficult for dark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! A very natural tan with an olive undertone that matches me perfectly. This was my first time self tanning, and I was a little nervous about how it would look, but this looked incredible. I would recommend using nitrile gloves instead of a mitt because they don't absorb any product and have no streaking! I did not use this on my face for fear of breaking out, but I would recommend using the St. Tropez Face Tanning Mist. It works great!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a go to for adding some natural looking color to the skin, this product doesn't look orange, but in fact has an olive tone to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a self-tan rookie so I was both excited and nervous to try this. I am naturally fair skinned and do not tan easily, but this gave me a beautiful golden glow with NO orange tint. I used this with the St. Tropez mitt which I would highly recommend getting because it makes the application much more even and you avoid getting the dreaded self-tan hands. Also very handy to have a friend do your back for you! PROS - mousse formula is easy to apply, guide color makes it easy to see where you're applying, no transfer on clothes or sheets once dry, and initial scent is nice. CONS - self-tan smell got much stronger after this was on my skin for a couple hours. After about 2-3 hours the initial fragrance had diminished and a strong self-tan scent took it's place until I showered. I have a few uneven spots around my ankles, but that is user error since this is my first time self-tanning with a mousse and mitt. I'd say overall it's a great product!

reviews.review_title: golden hour without the golden hour
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best self tanner out there. Everything else makes me so orange and streaky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice natural looking tan and was easy to apply as long as you make sure it is even. I applied it and slept and then washed it off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first self tanner I’ve used (I used to do tanning beds) and it was super easy to use. I followed the instructions the best I could and I didn’t have any issues with it. I did two applications about 2 days apart and it worked really well! I dared to try it on my face and it worked well with a kabuki brush. At first it smells really good but has the tan smell after the 4hrs

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I don’t leave reviews for products unless I love them. This stuff is amazing. Absolutely no streaks anywhere and went on so smoothly! Dries quickly and didn’t stain the clothes I put on afterward. You do get that self tanner smell just slightly, but small price to pay for how natural and buildable the product is. Will be buying again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Legit. I refused to by this. Refused to spend $40 on self tanner. Bought much cheaper tanners and was always underwhelmed. until I saw the QVC deal which was two for $50. Then I was like ok, let's do it. Holy crap. THE EASIEST to apply and the color....Like I just went in for  a second coat because it's just beautiful and it doesn't cling and streak. Totes worth the money I can't even believe it, my favorite so far hands down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gives my a great natural color! When I use this, I get multiple compliments on my tan. I recommend it to all of my friends because it is easy to use and you do not have to apply it perfectly and it will still look great. I leave it on for 7 hours and although it is a long time to sit and not do much, it is totally worth it because my tan comes out great. Even if I don’t have much time and just leave it on for 4 hours, I still get a visible sun kissed look. The down side is that it does have a strong self tanner smell for 1 to 2 days, but it looks great so it is worth it for me. It does not come off patchy like other self tanners and I have not had any problems with streaking or other typical problems. It also does NOT clog my pores or make me break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best self tanner available. While I am a firm believer that 40% of self tanning is the skin prep - this stuff is amazing. Goes on even, no streaking, I can apply to my face without breaking out. I apply two coats (let the first one dry and reapply) and I love the color I get. It fades out naturally and doesn’t get blotchy as it wears off. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product is great! I am light-medium skin tone (depending on the season) and this product gives me that beachy-glowy-just left the seaside look all year round! I am frequently complimented on the way the tan looks. Not to mention, who doesn’t feel more confident when you have that glow going on?! I have recommended this product to countless friends. After a shower and shave I moisturize and then apply this product and go about my day! Doesn’t transfer on to clothing either! I did one time get the product directly on my robe (oops) but it came out in the wash! Great product! 10/10 recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really works. Color is natural, even, and there is no unpleasant smell. Product worked a lot better than anticipated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This self tanner is AMAZING! It's easy to apply (I used a mit which I strongly recommend to reduce streaks and to keep your hands clean), it looks natural from day one and fades in a subtle way just as a real sun tan would. The color is not overly dark, so if you're looking for a dramatic tan, you will not achieve that color in one application with this product. I really like the shade, it looks like I've been in the sun for a whole afternoon. The color lasts about one week, and gradually gets lighter and lighter, I can't believe how natural this looks. I've been reapplying weekly, and it goes on just as well as the first time.  If you've never used St. Tropez before, just be aware that when you apply it, it has a subtle green tint to it, but that is temporary, after the tan develops and you shower the green is gone. One very slight drawback is that I did notice it dried my skin out a bit, nothing that applying lotion couldn't fix, and besides, when you use self tanner you need to exfoliate and hydrate anyway, so normal maintenance.  I 1000% recommend this for a natural, subtle tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried sooo many tanning products. Being pale and skin cancer-prone it’s been a journey finding one that doesn’t make me look orange. This product not only is fool proof because it shows up immediately but it leaves a beautiful natural-looking tan. It has an olive hue vs orange but it still looks natural with pink undertones. The exfoliating mit by st tropez also works magically in removing the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Be sure to apply with applicator mitt To increase color, reapply

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Have used this product for 5 years. I have med color skin. After you get your summer tan u can still use to freshen up your Tan. I also use in winter on face and neck or where ever I need a little color during winter.....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Mon auto bronzant préféré et de loin! Si vous l’appliquez bien et que vous le laissez agir le temps qu’il faut et plus encore, vous allez avoir un résultat magnifique! (Ne pas oublier de bien s’exfolier quelques jours avant et SURTOUT ne pas oublier de bien s’hydrater pour éviter à l’auto bronzant d’aller se réfugier dans les ridules d’une peau sèche)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have porcelain skin, so you would expect that I would get some color from this... Wrong. Left it on overnight, and the next day, all of what was sitting on my skin washed off and there is no difference to my legs. Absolute waste of money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time using self tanner and I’m obsessed! It does not look fake/streaky at all. I am very pale and it looks very natural on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the easiest self tanner that I’ve ever used at home. I applied it with an applicator glove and it is flawless. It did take about 3 applications to get to the color that I was happy with but no orangey undertones and no weird lines.

reviews.review_title: Great for First Timer and Fairer Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying self tanner, and this is awesome. My friend recommended it to me and said it looks better on fairer skin (which I am). It gives the perfect glow with a conservative first use (just a hint of color) and I applied a second time 4 days later and it’s the perfect tan. I exfoliated before both applications. Definitely recommend the mitt! I do think it dries my skin out a little, but just moisturize every night/morning. Also it left some residual color on my bathrobe after I applied, but it washed out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This self tan was my third experience with self tan (I tried Jergens, Clarins (which was good) and St-Tropez) and I was a little confused at first when I put it on my glove because it was olive/brown/green. I tought it was expired but no, this green/grey color gives u the perfect tan, it’s not orange at all, which I love. I’m pale and the Classic is perfect for me. Also, I do moisturize first but I don’t always exfoliate and my tan is always great. But for my face, I always exfoliate and moisturize because I have dry spots on my face. I recommend to use the glove tho, I’ve tried it without and the difference is inexplicable. Also, if it turns out too much on your face, just rinse it off a little bit and it will be perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favourite Spray tan, I buy this frequently it never lets me down. Doesn't smell terrible, I would also highly recommend getting the tan mitt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First time EVER using self tanner! I loved this product (although I don’t have anything to compare it to). No streaks and long lasting glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great self tanner, love it. Does everything u need it to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Happy with the results and like how there isn't a strong tan smell. However, not sure why when it comes out, there's a green hue to it...I've used multiple tanning foam products before and used to the foam being brown/dark brown when you apply it. Not sure if this is normal. Also, doesn't last as long as other products I have used in the past.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the mousse is so easy to apply and you get an amazing authentic colour. Love this product.

reviews.review_title: Best color over most self tanners
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Before this I’ve used several drugstore tanners like L’Oréal and spray tanned at a salon. Overall I find the coverage and quality of St Tropez well worth the price. I use the bronzing more to apply all over and so far it’s my favorite tone of any self tanners. No hint of orange or brassiness. Smell is pretty much on par with every other self tanner. Color lasts about 4-5 days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product since I was in high school and It is AMAZING. I have never used another product other than this for tanning. The tan looks so natural. I usually will take a shower in the morning and scrub my body hard to get all the dead skin off then moisturize my body so my body can hydrate all day and then at night before bed I will apply this. I have used the tanning mit by Sephora but a old wash cloth I have found works just as well! I apply it in circles on my body and do a smaller amount on my face and hands so hands and face don’t get too dark. I have never had a problem with this product being streaky which is A MIRACLE!  Because the product does warn of potential staining I alway sleep in dark clothes and with a darker blanket/sheets on my bed just in case. I wake up the next morning and shower to get any excess off my skin. MY SKIN LOOKS WONDERFULLY TAN AND SMOOTH AFTER. I get so many compliments on how tan I look and if I’ve been tanning and how smooth my tan is. I HIGHLY recommend this to anyone. very good product if you need to get tan quick for an event or holiday or just want to be tan in general!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time using a self tanner, and I chose this one for the reviews and the price. Although I haven’t tried any others, I will never buy a different tanner than this one. It left no streaks as long as you get the mitt (though I haven’t tried it without), it’s color was not orange at all, it was a nice glowing tint darker. It smells very good and doesn’t stain clothes or sheets after putting it on. I also recommend getting the kit that includes the face mist tanner and the mitt. You can find it on this website for $25. I love when things work exactly like I’d hoped and this product does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am giving this tanning mousse 3 stars because it does give you a nice instant color, however, it comes immediately off in the shower and on my white sheets. I have found that other products have lasted longer with less residue. If you do not mind washing your bed sheets daily then this is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: About to be a huge review/self tan guide so be warned. This is my total win by knockout favorite self tan. I’ve tried tons of other self tans and spray tans and St Tropez is always the tan that gets me the most compliments and “is your tan real?” questions which is the the ultimate goal. The undertone of this tanning mousse is the game changer for me because it’s a dark green/grey rather than orange like most bronzers so instead of turning you fake tan orange it actually makes you look more been in the sun natural brown. Self tanning was always such a chore because I had to take so much time otherwise it would look not only fake but baaaad. You still have to be careful with this but I don’t have nearly the problem with it that I have ever had with other products. Every bit of tanning advice ever will tell you “don’t moisturize before tanning” and that’s kind of true, moisturize (and I mean bathe yourself in it) about 1hr before so it really soaks in and you are dry and this stuff glides on like a dream evenly with no streaks. It blends so easily and it sets right up and drys if you just chill for a few minutes then you’re good to go with baggy clothes. Second thing most tanning advice will say is don’t do a second coat which I have found to be true mostly except for with this product. I usually put on a coat and as soon as I finish do another on top and it always turns out gorgeous. I leave it on overnight (though I have been in a hurry before and washed off after 5 hours and it still looked good!) and wash the guide off in the morning and the tan left behind is always beautiful! You will not regret purchasing this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this but the bottle doesn't last very long ..have to make many trips to keep it in supply ..color is good not orange

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite self-tanner ever. I have a spray tan membership, but I would instead use this at home. The color is SOOO much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best tanning mousse I have used! I have tried Loving Tan & Tarte tanning products and none of those worked for me. This St. Tropez mousse matches my skin tone perfectly I look so bronzed not orange at all! I put it on before bed and wake up with a beautiful tan. Love this brand!

reviews.review_title: Still the best self tanner for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As far as self tanners go this is the best for me. I have tried a few others but this one is easy to use and gives me the “most natural” looking color.  It does still have a self tanner smell but not as bad as some of the others I have used. I use this on my body and face, it works fine on the face for me.  I do use a mitt to apply it and a small mitt to apply for my face. I ended up buying the mitts on amazon because I couldn’t find a small one from Sephora

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after reading about soo many self tanners. I absolutely love it!! It smells amazing and with the mitt it’s a game changer for me! Self tanning has always felt like such a hassle, this dries quickly and you can see where you’ve applied so it makes it easy to apply evenly. I will definitely buy again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to write this review because this is the best self tanner! I stopped using it St. Tropez a few years ago and switched to Bondi Sandi because a you tuber said it was great.  It did not last as long as St. Tropez and the tan made me look greenish.  When I came back to St. Tropez I fell in love even more.  This will last 7 days unlike the other tanners out there, and the formula seems better.  I'm fair with golden undertones, and this tanner makes me look golden - just absolutely gorgeous!  I love you St. Tropez and will never leave again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've used a lot of self tanners over the years and this is my absolute favorite! I'm pretty fair and this looks so natural. You can give yourself a little bit of color, or use multiple layers for a deep tan. I would definitely recommend using a mitt to apply and exfoliating before use. It does have a bit of a smell (not as bad as others) and will transfer color to sheets or clothes, though this usually washes out.

reviews.review_title: The BEST self-tanner I have tried!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to self-tanner! I have been happy with this for years now and will continue to repurchase it. It is the perfect tanner for my fair skin and fades nicely. I prefer the classic of all the types out of all of their tanners. I always use the tanning mitt to apply and get great results!

reviews.review_title: Best quick faux tan! Soft skin and everything!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I’m very pale with no real undertone to my skin (I’m see through in the winter) so tanning products easily look orange on me. I got this for New Years the day of, put it on, and it made my legs look amazing! My boyfriend was even impressed that it didn’t look orange on me. It made my skin very soft, it added a nice shine to my legs, and it’s still lasting after four showers! Totally worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best self tanner ever. No mistakes in the aplicattion and final results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this tanner. I am very fair skinned and use this throughout the winter and even the summer when I need some extra color. It doesn't make you look orange at all and is even gentle enough to use on your face. It doesn't make you too tanned wither. For me, it actually just gives my skin a healthy look to it. Definitely buy the applicator mitt too in order to apply it. And make sure to spread it evenly, as it will streak if applied unevenly. It also definitely has that self tan odor to it and will sweat off if you don't give it enough time to sink in. As long as you rub it in fully and give it time to dry, it's great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Remember to rub the product and in small circular motion. It’s not too tan for pale skin. I use it year round.   I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: All time favorite self tanner hands down. There is a light odor and color transfer to clothing but It washes out easily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much because it gives me a beautiful and even tan. It also fades very nicely and never looks splotchy. The only thing I don’t like is it smells awful while it’s developing before you wash it off, but it’s worth it for how dark I am after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a very pale redhead and this is the only tanning product that I will use, it's amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’d love to give this product 5 stars - the color is very natural, it’s easy to apply and a quick drying. However two complaints keep me from really committing to a 5 star review. 1) I find this self tanner to be especially during compared to others I’ve used. I have to really double down on my kiehls lotion to just not feel like a scaley monster and 2) this stuff does come off on your sheets (and toilet seat, or anything light colored that your tan behind may grace). It leaves somewhat of a purple/green residue on anything you touch in the first 12-24 hours. I’m still using it, because the color is really that good, but goodness I wish they’d fix the color transfer issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff!! Keeps me tan in the cold winter months. The color looks great, just make sure you exfoliate regularly or you’ll end up with some nasty tan streaks. I don’t tan my face and always block it from the sun, so this is great to keep my face looking tan without having the sun exposer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Follow the directions and girllllllll watch yourself catch that man

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible product. i bought this self-tanning high rated product because of reviews. Nothing but problems. First of: it is makes all beddings and clothing yellow and destroys expensive pillows. The second problem was: i took it with me in the trip ( checked in luggage). The container leaked and destroyed a couple my expensive t-shirts. What a gig!!! Plus: ridiculous price and it goes off with first shower. Don't recommend. Never again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There’s so much I want to say about this product! First off, I’m super pale and I’ve always been self-conscious about this. I never liked to wear shorts, dresses or skirts because I felt people could see my veins through my skin. Seriously. So I always resorted to self-tanning products, mainly because I don’t like to tan in the sun because of all the risks. I started off trying drug-store products, but I found a flaw in every product I used; they were either streaky, blotchy, orange, and/or lasted a day. So then I resorted to self-tan salons, but they broke the bank. Each session was around $35, took too much time, and always had streaks all over my hands and feet. Then I found this product. At first I thought $42 was steep for a self-tanner, and I don’t know who has to read this, but… IT’S SO WORTH IT YOU GUYS. Not to say I’m a beginner with self-tanners, but from the first time I used this I got the most perfect result. Not orange, no streaks, no blotches! If you prep your skin in the shower before applying (cleanse, exfoliate, shave, moisturize), you will get a perfect result every single time. I personally used a tanning mitt and start from the bottom up. I also use only left-over product left on the mitt to apply to feet and hands. For my face, I NEVER use this product; I highly recommend the water face mist, because it’s not as heavy and more sublte. My tan usually lasts about 10-14 days if I properly maintain my skin – use a loofah just once a week, use an in-shower gradual self-tanner   (I use Jergens) for body and the face mist for hands and face every other day and moisturize every day. I've been doing this for four weeks now and I've never been more confident about myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good that it provides a guide color. My skin has peachy tan tones. This bronzing mousse seems to go on green/olive. Not for me. Maybe for you if you have olive skin? I used an applicator mitt and has no streaking problems.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product gives a nice and natural looking tan. You do have to use more than what you think so because of that I reduced a star. If you use a pump and rub it in you will just get a slight tan/glow. I more have to add 2 layers; one layer is rubbed in then the second layer is more plopped on the surface to really deepen the tan. I haven’t finished the bottle yet but with the amount I have to use, I can’t imagine it will last for very many applications.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: St. Tropez Dark: great color, smell is fine, doesn’t leave you super sticky. Lasts about 5-7 days if taking good care of the tan.   St. Tropez Classic: color is okay, not as dark as I was hoping. Smell is fine, doesn’t feel sticky, stays about 3-5 days.   St. Tropez Express: great for a quick tan but stickier and smells more like tanner that other products I’ve tried. Works very quickly but only lasts about 3 days.

reviews.review_title: Hesitant at first but liked the results
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I read reviews prior to buying. I exfoliated one day and waited the recommended 24hrs before using this product. Prior to using it, I moisturizer my elbows, ankles, feet, and knees (dry areas) then I began to use two pumps on each arm, 4 pumps per leg and 5 pumps for body (recommended by St Tropez website). I used the mitt of course. You’ll wait 4-8 hours until you can shower. It smells like biscuits and nothing unpleasant. You will need to exfoliate twice a week and moisturize daily in the meantime to maintain streak free even tan. I’m a very fair person and this worked great, def no orange look to me. Good luck!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not that this product needs another glowing review, but it’s AMAZING! The scent is nice, goes on easily, drys super fast and leaves a believable tan color. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was a spray tan artist for years and worked with many lines- including St Tropez. It is hands down the best product on the market! The mousse is my go to self tanner, it’s very forgiving and easy to apply. I use a latex glove under a fuzzy sock (pro application tip!). The product fades beautifully, never blotchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good tan for fair skin. I use a mit and buff and have zero issues with the look. The down side of this product is that the smell out of the bottle is a bit on the chemical side, it has stained my sheets and outdoor cushions and it scrubs off in the shower... not all of the color, but quite a bit. If I decide to use this anymore, I won’t get near anything white and I’ll do a pre bed shower.
Have been using this tanning mousse for years now. Always a re purchase for me. I like using it in the summer over my light tan. That way I can get darker without having to be in the sun so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First self tanner that is easy to use and doesn’t make me orange. I LOVE THIS STUFF. Put it on before bed and wake up and shower it off and your tan!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to self tanner! I can always count on getting an even color, especially when I am consistent with using lotion every day after I apply it. It's not like other self tanners that come off easily when exercising/sweating a lot, it stays and I never notice streaks (unless I don't apply it well). Definitely get the mitt to go with it and rub in circles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this to create fake freckles, so I cannot speak for how even or deep this applies all over. It gives very natural looking freckles, that peak through a light coverage foundation. Lasts about three or four days on the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It gives a nice tan but I feel like it doesn't last very long. I applied twice over 5 days and it faded away very quickly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Great natural glow. Not orange, and not streaky. Totally recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It never comes out even. It’s fine but there are better self tanners on the market around the same price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must have for self tanners! The color is not orangey, and I love that you have an idea of what it will look like when you first put it on. The color deepens over 24 hours, and you're left with a beautiful glow that looks like it came from the sun. With a cancer scare, my days in the sun are over. This is my go-to! One thing...you need to purchase the mitt to put it on evenly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried at least 4 other self tanners, and was disappointed by all of them. This is by far the best. Any streaking I do find is probably due to my laziness. HA!

reviews.review_title: Life saver for a girl who sun burns easily
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m very pale and whenever I go out in the sun I get red. In the past I would sun tan so easily. I loved being bronzed in the summer when wearing summer clothes. I decided to give this a try and I love it. Its making me feel so confident. A tip is to exfoliate and lightly moisturize elbows, knees and hands

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mousse is amazing!! I am used to using a lotion but now that I’ve used this I’ll never go back! I’m pretty fair and I do not feel orangey at all and I slept with it on all night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a self tanning noob and this was the first product I have tried of the sort. I exfoliated like my life depended on it, applied body butter to my hands, ankles, feet, knees, and elbows and applied with the St. Tropez mitt. I had my mom help me with my back - I have no idea how one would do it on their own. It goes on a dark greenish colour which was mildly disturbing to begin with and I wasn't sure if I got a bad batch! However, it faded into a lovely, natural looking tan overnight. I was able to sleep in it and had no transfer to my sheets. I have fair to light skin and It was not as dark as I was expecting, so if you are looking for a darker tan, I would definitely go with one of the darker mousses. However, this was a good colour for me as a first timer and I didn't notice any streakyness. It has been about 10 days now and I would say it faded evenly. I had some slight orange tones in between my fingers so I must not have blended my hands properly, but other than that no issues with any orange colouring. It also did not irritate my skin in the slightest and I have very sensitive skin. All in all, quite impressed with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I am olive skin brown eyes and this looks beautiful on my skin . I bought the 8oz. bottle and it lasted me a long time .loved the feel on my skin ,the scent was fine too. I was a sun worshiper but stopped sunning years ago .this product gives me the best color no worries does not turn orange. F.Y.I. I use moisturizer before applying and it blends evenly ,no streaks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favourite self tanner! I constantly get compliments on my tan, which everyone thinks is real.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I highly recommend this product! I used jergens before and it is absolutely terrible! It was so uneven, streaky, and orange! As long as you apply the formula properly, then you will not have any patches or unevenness. Make sure to moisturize all dry areas such as the knees, elbows, wrists, ankles, hands, and feet before you apply. I am an extremely pale irish girl and most people cant tell when I use this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this self-tanner! The first couple times I used it were definitely a struggle - I had never self-tanned before. But once I got the hang of it, it comes out flawlessly every time. I'm normally fair-skinned, and it doesn't come out orange-y at all. I even use it to tan my face using a fluffy blush brush and it blends perfectly. I have a lot of scars on my knees from when I was a kid and at first it made them a bit dark, but I've learned to work around it, so don't get discouraged if you're trying it for the first time. You'll learn what works best for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First time using a self tanner so I have nothing to compare to but this does the job nicely. The guide colour is dark so I only kept the tanner on for 3 hours instead of the 4-8.
