I was worried it was going to end up too dark for me but It’s a pretty, natural looking tan and it doesn’t have any smell on the application ALTHOUGH after rinsing the tan off there is a weird smell it left behind on my skin.

reviews.review_title: Hands down the best formula out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough about how great this tanning mousse is. Easy to apply, non streaking, lasts long, fades evenly and when I say no foul tanner smell there is NO tanner smell. (Most people say none when they really mean faint smell but this stuff does not smell like tanner AT ALL.). I have tried so many others (Jergens -horrible smell and strange orange color), Sally Hansen (decent but fades pretty quickly) Isle of Paradise (all formulas) which comes in second for me but a distant second. Isle of Paradise still smells like tanner a bit and doesn’t have the same rich color that St. Tropez does. I have both the dark and the classic and I think the classic works best for my fair to medium skin tone. It looks natural and is a beautiful color. This is the best there is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smooth and Easy to apply! Looks like a real tan. Not orange like a lot of other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to self tanner! It’s easy to apply with the St. Tropez glove. I put it on before I go to bed & then wash it off in the morning. It gives you a beautiful natural colour. Make sure you exfoliate the day before for a more seamless application! As much as this is my favourite tanning product I wish that it didn’t have as strong of a self-tanner smell... but I have found that this is basically unavoidable. It also can dye your sheets so I would recommend sleeping on a towel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this 4.75 stars if possible. This mouse blends well, is build-able and works well on my fair/light legs. It's still a tad bit orange like most sunless tanners, but by far the best I have found.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is orange-ish and unnatural but it didn't streak when using the mitt which is an upside.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing for my ultra pale skin. In the summer I blind everybody with my flashing white skin. I exfoliate and shave prior to apply this, and I apply non-scented cream in the feet, knees, elbows, neck and face areas, so the stain factor is reduced and it looks more natural. Does not turn orange, ever. It fades in about 1-2 weeks for me but it's totally normal I always swim in pools and shave. Could last longer if I hydrated my skin and avoided baths/pools.  Quick tip: You'll need a good glove and a back applicator along with acetone for the nails afterwards. I apply baby powders in rubbing areas before dressing up and leave it for one hour for a slight tint or a whole night when it's full summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was extremely worried about using this produce as I am a natural red head with extremely fair skin and never tan. I did a lot of research before hand, read tons of reviews, and went to town. I'm super impressed with the color. While to most it might look like I still don't have any color, there is a noticeable glow to my skin that is natural and not orange at all. The color is beautiful and subtle and just makes me feel more confident! The guide was helpful to see spots where I missed and make sure I had an even, streak free coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Looks really nice on fair skin. My face turned out a little too dark. I used one pump on my face and neck. Next time I will use about a half pump. Great product and I would purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It gives you a really nice tan, but it fades poorly and makes it look like your skin is rubbing off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! As long as you adhere to the universal techniques of sunless tanning, this will produce an easy and quick self tan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is 100% the best out there. I have tried every self tanner and always find myself going back to this one. What I love is that it gives you a olive tan instead of a orange one. It also works instantly. It’s the best!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This gives a very natural looking tan that is easy to apply. As far as shades go, light-medium-dark, I would definitely say this is light. I do have fair skin but also prefer a darker tan, as I don’t feel that this one makes much of a difference from my natural skin tone, even after waiting the full 8  hours before showering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color, goes on evenly no streaks. Lasts about 4-5 days. I know you’re not supposed to use it on your face but I put it on mine and it made my skin break out pretty bad. Also caused some breakouts on my arms and legs. Not a huge deal considering it has happened with other tanners but until I find a self tanner that doesn’t cause me to break out and has color as good as this one, the st. Tropez classic is for sure my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great value! Goes on easy (use the mit!), put it on before bed, wake up with a tan! So much better than tanning in the sun. Also, doesn't turn you orange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Streaky, fades in patches, lasts only a few days. Disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always used tanning lotions, and this is my first time trying a tanning mouse. I really liked this product, it dried so quickly and was easy to put on. I applied this at night, and when I woke up the next day I was very tan (I have pale skin), and after taking a shower it was a very nice healthy glow.  Any tanning product will not apply smoothly if you do not prep and maintain your skin by routinely exfoliating and moisturizing your skin. Since this product dries quickly you really have to work fast to rub it in evenly so it doesn't dry with streaks.  I haven't tried this but I can imagine you can apply this 2 days in a row to achieve a deeper tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best self tanning product I have ever used! It does not streak and leaves such a beautiful natural glow! I bought the little set and then loved it so much I bought the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am fair skinned and this is one of the prettiest self tanner I have used. it does not make me orange but a nice bronze/tan color. Love this stuff!! easy to apply too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I always come back to this self tanner. I have fair skin so it's difficult to find one that doesn't leave my skin looking orange and this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In love !! This is the perfect tan color for pale porcelain skin! The green undertones gives a very natural results! Beautiful medium tan, not too light and not too dark! Yes the bottle is pricey but if you apply every week it should last 3 months! It does stain sheets a bit but all self tan does, i recommend getting dark bed sheets! Better then spray tan that stink and are expensive! If you have pale skin i really recommend this self tan!

reviews.review_title: Does this even need another positive review?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best self tanner available. Don’t even think twice. I am the palest of the pale, have tried every self tanner out there, and have been turned every shade of streaky, blotchy orange possible.  This is a game changer. I am incapable of tanning naturally - I literally only burn and go back to white. I used this one time and had the most natural-looking, beautiful tan I have EVER had. No streaks no blotches no presidential orange. Incredible stuff.  I left it on for 7 hours and it lasted me 8 days afterwards. ONLY DOWNSIDE (I swear it’s near perfect) is that it faded in one tiny patch where my bra sits against my rib cage. Maybe from the skin rubbing there all day? Not sure but who can complain. This product is insanity. Best ever.

reviews.review_title: Nobody knows I'm a pale girl
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using fake tanner for years (I love being tan but avoid the sun AT ALL COSTS... I'm very scared of wrinkling), and this is the BEST fake tanner.  I've tried about every one, but this is by far the most natural and the easiest to wash off hands.  Don't wear white the same day.  Don't sleep in white sheets.  I feel like it takes a little longer to dry than for others  (I'll putz around for an hour after), but it's so so worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the color this self tanner makes my skin. it's a great product but still not a miracle product. It is very sticky for a couple of hours, and the scent is your typical self tanning scent. This is the best self tanner to come along and I will reccomend until that miracle product comes along that doesn't make you sticky or smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best self tanner I’ve ever used! I have light skin that leans quite yellow anyway, so turning orange from self tanner has never really been a concern of mine. But I do feel that this gives a really natural bronze color. When applied with a mit, it goes on really evenly, I’ve never had any problems with streaky tans from this product. The color lasts fairly well compared to similar products, and it doesn’t have any weird smell or leave my skin feeling tacky or oily. In fact, it seems to make my skin feel really soft and smooth. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to self tanner. Easy application and fast drying time. I don't have to stand around naked for too long lol. I would make sure (with any self tanner) that you REALLLY try to blend out the ankle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm new to self tanner and being as fair as I am, I was pretty nervous. This went on nicely (I used the mitt), didn't stink up my house and when I washed it off, wasn't streaky or blotchy. I did use a foundation brush around my wrists, ankles, hands, feed, elbows and knees. There was no dramatic colour difference on these spots which was great! The final colour was nice, I was hoping for a little darker though. I'm very fair, and after 8.5 hours, the colour was only a few shades darker than my skin. Natural looking though. Am ordering the express tan next as this did kind of come off on my sheets

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will never buy another tanning lotion !! This one smells great and so easy to apply

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To me this is the holy Grail of self Tanners! I’m extremely pale and having self tanning since I can remember. This is by far the most natural looking and most flawless to apply. Most people are shocked when I tell them that I self tan. I use this one daily  to give me a nice glow. And it last me a while. I’ll use the darker shade if I’m going to the beach.

reviews.review_title: Overall good product, but does have a smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product because of the positive reviews and because it’s advertised as not having a self tanner smell. While I am pleased with the products overall performance, I do find the claims on smell misleading. Once applied it does leave your skin with a sunless tanner smell that lasts for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Quick way to get a ‘fake’ glow. This stuff is amazing!  I’m fair with olive undertones and this tanner is so nice for those winter days when I’m looking like a vampire and want some colour. I recommend buying the mitt for this as it does help with application. I usually apply this directly onto the mitt and then gently massage onto the skin and be careful to not let Product sit at all on the skin without massaging it in as it stains and can make you look blotchy. I used this last year a few days before a wedding I was a bridesmaids for and with 3 days of careful application I had such a nice tan that it looked like I went away for holidays. Will repurchase once I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product to use before my vacation to help my pale sunless skin. I have never self tanned before so I was incredibly lost. The sales associates were so helpful and recommended this original formula to me and the mitt. It was so easy, not streaky and didn't leave my skin orange at all! Love this as a sunless tanner and would defiantly recommend even if you have never used  a product like this before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product, but it does look a bit orange. I have olive skin and turn bronze quite easily in the sun, but I wanted to protect my skin from sun exposure. I wanted a sunless product to smooth over my skin and look natural. This product does not look all that natural and quite frankly, I can’t stand that orange sheen. I prefer Loving Tan, which actually does provide a browner tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing results, I was concerned that the color may look orange or streak but the final result was a gorgeous tan. I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Natural tan look for my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really impressed with this product last summer. I got 3 months worth with this bottle. I did use with the mitt for purchase separately. Strongly encourage using with a mitt.   I just bought my second bottle in preparation for this next summer.   It does have a smell but its not horrible. I do shower after 8 hours of applying and this tan lasts 3 days before I reapply to maintain the color. I shower everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this self tanner. Leaves a nice golden bronze color with no streaks thanks to the St. Tropez Applicator Mitt. Does not have a strong scent like other self tanners do. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gives a nice and natural looking tan. Definitely has a smell to it, but I don't really mind it. This is good for tanning beginners, can't make too many mistakes when applying with a mit. It lasts for me about a week on my body and 3-4 days on my hands due to washing them so frequently. I do use this on my face as well from time to time and it usually lasts 2-3 days, I do not experience break outs when I do apply it to my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply (with the mitt), the bronze color at application makes it easy to see where the product is being applied.  I didn't notice any streaking or discolored spots.  There was a little bit of the self-tan odor, but it wasn't overwhelming, nor was there any color transfer to clothes or sheets, etc.  I did see some wash-off in the shower, but I assume it was just the bronzing part of it and it only happened that 1st shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GREAT color and lasts for a few days. It does smell a bit (self tanner smell), and it can come off on sheets or pajamas (I use it at night). I’ve used this for two years, and overall I’m happy with it. I think it’s the best self tanner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many tanning products and always come back to this one!!

reviews.review_title: Love it BUT wish the colour lasted longer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am super super pale and I LOVE this tan. I do sleep with it on and find I am a bit orange my first day but the following days are a gorgeous tan. It will Stain light sheets and clothing before you wash it off! I only gave four stars because despite using oil free products/ moisturizing / exfoliating properly I find I only have a “ tan” for 2-3 days. I am quite pale so I do expect this but always wish it lasted longer!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just used this product for the first time. So far, I LOVE IT! I do have one question, though.  I'm going to Hawaii the first of April and will be in and out of the ocean, as well as chlorinated pools, like...a LOT!!!  Will this hold up to all of this water? How often should I apply it?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is very good for a self tanner at home! I love versa spray tans and this one has a very similar coloring! I used this while in Los Cabos and was really glad I brought it along with me! I used the mit and did two coats all over. Tan was perfect! (I use two coats just in case I missed an area the first time!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No streaks, perfect application with the st.tropez glove. Lasts about 4 days for me. I love this stuff for all summer. A little goes a long way. The tan stays at the same color all four days unlike a spray tan that is really dark at first and then the time you want and then gone. This is way better for buying matching foundation etc. Exfoliating all of your skin before applying makes all the difference! It’s not sticky and does not stain my clothes or rub off on clothes. I wear for about 24 hours before washing top coat off. Definitely will be using this again this summer. I re applied every four days and went through only about 5 bottles all summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Run, don't walk to buy this tanner. This was probably the easiest self tanning experience I have ever had. Works great. Definitely need the mitt the apply properly. No super strong smell, not sticky, and did not leave me orange at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite. Works fast and non streaking. Never have issues with stains on clothes. Always get compliments on my tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have light skin and this product gives me an olive color. Absolutely no streaks at all I look like I normally do when I get a sun tan. I’m really happy I found this product I love the tan look and now I can have it without sun damage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am the palest of palest and this foam leaves zero streaks on me and is a great color - not orange at all. I make sure to exfoliate before hand, especially my neck area, otherwise there may be a bit of patchiness but still nothing crazy. Love putting it on at night, waiting about 15 to put clothes on, then waking up tan! would 100% recommended this product.   Literally the only issue with this is I have found that every single 8oz bottle leaks when it’s on its side so you have to pay attention to it when traveling (I put it standing up in my tote - in a plastic bag) and if it’s going in a suitcase, needs to be a sealed brand new bottle and unfortunately can’t bring it back home once opening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Out of all the self-tanners I've tried, this St. Tropez classic bronzing mousse is my all time favorite. Unlike others which can leave an orange tint, this product leaves a natural golden tan finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i love this tanner but it does take a very long time to dry and it is sticky after applying. i also need to rinse off the next morning and it does rub off on clothes / sheets after putting it on within the first 24 hours. sometimes it makes for a greenish tint in your tan too which is unflattering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this it’s very easy to apply and see where it’s going. And washes up easily if it gets on the floor or shower floor. I’ve used MANY self tanning options and this is by far one of my favorites. For sure worth the money. No bad smell or sticky feeling it’s great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't leave you orange. Very easy to use! I got the largest size, and bought the mitt separately. Very happy with it. I exfoliated and carefully followed instructions, and it ended up lasting me a week before needing to reapply. I also applied it to my face but since I exfoliate every night with glycolic acid it faded much more quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was too dark for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great tanner but the lid can be tricky. It leaked over half the bottle ALL over my drawer. Be sure it doesn't unscrew itself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok people, do yourself a favour and just buy this. I'm extremely pale and this gave me a nice healthy glow without looking fake. Plus... I put it on one afternoon and dangerously slept on white sheets with none rubbing off that night. THEN I proceeded to go swimming the next day in a white one piece bathing suit (bridal shower, I'm not that extra don't worry) and it held on with none rubbing off on the suit either. What more can you ask for?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my HG tanning product. I have fair/light skin and the color always looks natural and is very buildable. Dries super quick and lasts a long time. Very happy to see it now is available in a carry-on friendly size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! It goes on easy, doesn’t streak. It gives you a nice golden brown tan without looking orange. It doesn’t have the smell most self tanners have.

reviews.review_title: Great tan; color rubbed off on my clothes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It gave a great tan but it stained my clothes.  The stain washed out.  I just don't have a half hour to wait to get dressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first self tanner I've tried and I love it! It provides a natural looking tan that lasts 2-3 days. If applied properly, it does not streak. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this to even out my real tan. Like where my bathing suit sits. My skin is medium-tan and the result looks almost as good as a natural tan and very natural. It works great at evening out because it’s lighter than my skin so it’s very gradual. Ive also used it on my whole body. I like to use a buffing brush to blend out the edges. The mitt is okay but not AMAZING. Leaves some streakiness and absorbs a lot of product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this self tanner. I’m very fair (redhead & pasty) and have used multiple self tanners in the past. When I get a spray tan at the salon, the lightest shade is too dark on my skin tone. This mousse is wonderful. I exfoliate and shave before applying and apply with a fluffy sock (latex gloves underneath) because I’ve found that mitts don’t allow you to bend your fingers much to get around the knees and ankles. I initially got the 4oz bottle in a sample pack and it’s been enough for 3 whole body uses. It goes on just dark enough to see where you’ve applied, the only issue I’ve found is because it doesn’t show the tan right away, there are some spots that turn out lighter. I usually fix it the next day and then after a shower I’m evened out. I haven’t applied to my face yet because in the summer I have so many freckles my face is naturally darker than my body. Would definitely recommend!! Just purchased the 8oz bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in a Sephora Favorites kit and was not too excited about it since I am already naturally tan.  I decided to try it for the heck of it and WOW!  This is an amazing product.  It made my skin look bronze (not fake) and I immediately began receiving compliments.  I will definitely use again.  I recommend for anyone interested in self tanning options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very streaky. Why hasn't science perfected a self-tanner!?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color I get from this product! It's easy to see where you applied and looks great. Problem is it only looks good for a day or two. It fades horribly, looks splotchy and patchy. If you have an event this will make you look great for the event, going on a week long holiday, not so much. It's not buildable so pretty much have to scrub hard to get previous application off before you start new one.  Even though it fades so bad i continue to repurchase this product because I love the color and can't find one that looks better if I need a tan for a certain outfit or event

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff.  Minimal smell and great color, not orange.  I have fair skin and have used this product for several years. I have tried numerous self tanning products and this one by far looks like a real sun tan. The mitt makes application accurate with little to no streaking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After years of trying every self tanner imaginable, I have landed on St. Tropez. All self tanners have a slight odor to them, but this one is minimal compared to others (if they don't have the odor, they're probably natural and unfortunately don't work). I wish the mitt came with the product (I think it's about $7 sold separately) because it is essential to application, but if washed regularly, it can last a long time. Color is natural and beautiful. Highly recommend to everyone as a safe alternative to the dangers of tanning. (I've had several basal cell carcinomas and use sunscreen religiously).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't tan via the sun in order to preserve my skin.  This product is BY FAR the best self-tanner on the market.  The mitt is a must, for those who have not tried it yet.  There is a great video on how many pumps to use for each body area as well.  Instant tan, and long lasting.  I top up every two or three days, and I get so many comments on how tan I look, but without the question of whether or not it's real.

reviews.review_title: If you’re skeptical, buy this one!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it!! I’ve used several different types and the foam has definitely been my favorite, by far. Make sure you get the mitt to put the foam on nice and smooth. It’s a great color too and you can build it. I’m super pale and it’s builds great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I mix it with my daily body lotion to build up a nice glow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally prefer the express version. But his mouse is good to use, just be wary of streakiness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a classic for a reason. Good color and easy to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is just horrible!!  Exfoliated night before and moisturized. Next day did my self tan. Several hours later, we went to the pool. I sat on one of the white lounge chairs  and Had the mouse for several hours, followed instructions. went to the pool and sat on the lounge chairs when my son handed me his wet goggles to adjust, my tan started coming off on the white lounge chairs. Just terrible. Not worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I have purchased this from Sephora it has been green whenever I used it and I had to return it. Green means the Dihydroxyacetone, the ingredient that  tans your skin, has gone bad (I worked in a spray tanning salon for years.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best tanning product EVER.  Buy the applicator mitt too. Flawless, authentic looking tan that lasts. I am obsessed!

reviews.review_title: surprised...but not in a good way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the gradual tan lotion by St. Tropez and was loving it, but I wanted a longer lasting tan so I tried this. I’m very disappointed. I applied the tan with the St. Tropez mitt and waited a little over 8 hours to shower (both are as the bottle instructs), but my tan was still uneven, splotchy in places (knees, elbows, fingers, toes, upper chest, armpits, and around breasts), and much of it washed off in the shower. My face and chest are just as pale as they were before, and what didn’t wash off on the rest of my body now looks very orange. At first I thought this could be because I exfoliated my face and chest (due to acne), but this could not be the cause because 1) the product instructs you to exfoliate regularly in order to maintain the tan, not remove it, and 2) I also exfoliated on my upper back and it was not as light. The only aspects keeping it from 1 star in my book are that the smell was not bad and that BEFORE I took a shower, the tan was moderately even but very dark and natural-looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a beginner but I research the heck out of all products before I buy.  I ultimately chose St. Tropez and started with the light to medium.  It was SO EASY to put on, the color is your guide and after I put it on (it dries pretty fast!) I waited the 3 hours (well, 2 1/2) and then showered and went to bed.  The next morning I could smell that sort of tanning process smell but it wasn't overwhelming, I knew it had worked.  Looked in the mirror and my skin had the most natural and beautiful tan glow, with NO STREAKS, and NO STAINING on my clothes or sheets.  I would have to give this the most stars available and will definitely buy this again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this tanning foam!! Gives me an even and perfect coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product-so easy to apply with a mitt and perfect color!  Lasts a long time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this self tanner when I want a tan for a specific event.  It is pretty easy to apply and I just sleep in it overnight.  But, it does fade after just a few days which is a downside.

reviews.review_title: I think I might have gotten an old bottle!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the ST. TROPEZ self tanner. It has always gave my skin that natural looking tan and nothing else competes with this. So I was extremely disappointed when I picked up a bottle a few weeks ago at my local Sephora Store. I don’t know what went wrong? I have been using this for years so I know that I prepped and polished my skin as directed, but the results were not good at all! I honestly think that maybe I got a old bottle and the solution expired because I don’t understand how something that usually works so well and usually leaves my skin looking flawless like, all of the sudden not work! I will buy this again and hopefully the results will be better next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for over a month and it gives me great color that lasts. The only down side is that it gets all over everything, even after I give myself plenty of time to dry off, and I can't get it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Creates a beautiful even nice colored tan. Has a great scent and once it dries it will not come off onto clothing

reviews.review_title: Give me more sun with out the sun... yasssssss!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wooooooow! My first time usuing any self tanners. It def blew my mind. Loved the color it gave, easy application (a mit is a must!), scent was weird but tolerable, did not transfer to towels or clothes after use. The only negative is you can't get wet or sweat for 4 house after using. Three hours after I used this (thought it was enought time) I went to water my plants and water splashed  on my feet... and ya, left them blotchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There is no smell to this! I used to use the St. Tropez express tan, but never again! This is just as effective with NO smell. I don’t care if I have to wear it for longer, it’s worth it.

reviews.review_title: New at the self tanning Game.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVED this product! Such great results in one application! It glazed over my skin seamlessly and the outcome was so amazing. This is my first experience with self tanners since at least 2005 and WOW has the game changed. This has a slightly green cast when applying so you know you will get a gorgeous bronze with no orange! My husband also used this and he also had great results. My first try I had some places on my hands and ankles that were from user error. The next time I corrected my mistakes and rrally had such a flawless tan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was my first time using a self tanner and was super nervous to try. I bought this and a glove and it ended up being really easy and a great experience! The mousse goes on streak free. I just did upward buffing motions. The first time I did it I used it sparingly and had a light but even glow. The second time I used it I used a few more pumps and definitely noticed a difference in it being darker. I have been streak free, didn’t stain my clothes or bed, smelled nice, and doesn’t fade awkwardly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using St. Tropez for over 10 years now and I am so dissapointed they changed the formula. It is not the same as it used to be. It is definitely darker, no green base anymore, and my pale skin is orange. I have nothing positive to say about the new formula as you can see. The older version has a nice green base and was very easy to blend and fool proof, it went over areas seamlessly no matter how many layers you slathered on to build your tan. My knuckles have a pertruding Orange tinge to them with the new version. I no longer have a healthy glow in the sun and I look bad in all lights opposed to the older version I looked natural no matter what light I was in, it was that good. They added more fragrance however it goes away after about 2-3 hours and you’re left with a STRONG DHA smell. The color is also 1-2 shades darker then what it used to be. Whoever’s idea it was to shade the formula should be fired. I wont be repurchasing unless they add either the green base back or add the old version to the line. Disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how it gives me a bronzed look! I usually apply a couple layers before bed and rinse off in the morning. My only complaint is that when it fades it looks patchy.

reviews.review_title: Best self tanner I've ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used a self tanner that was so easy to apply and wears so evenly! I love this stuff! The color is warm and natural, not at all orange-y or streaky. Plus it smells so nice, not even a hint of that yucky, DHA stink. A little goes a long way, so start off with just a pump or two and work it in before going back for more. This bottle will last you for quite some time, even if you're using it 2-3 times per week. I used the St Tropez application mitt, and it went on smoothly and dried quickly. I also purchased the St Tropez eraser mitt which helped get rid of any saturated areas around my knees and ankles the next day (you know, the spots that get grossly dark and splotchy and give away the fact that your tan is fake). With regular exfoliating and moisturizing, my tan wore for a few days before gradually fading. If you're wondering if this is worth the money, I would say YES, it's so much better than anything I've ever tried from the drugstore. This even beats the $20  spray tans I've gotten, both in appearance AND cost. 10/10 will most definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_title: I will never use another self-tanner again!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a natural-looking tan that is buildable. I don’t get streaks or an orange hue. It smells pretty good for a self-tanner, too. Along with the mitt to apply, this is the best self-tanner I’ve ever seen!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color this produces. I bought the mit and did everything by the book but still ended up with darker ankles and feet. I just took a baby wipe the next day and scrubbed the dark areas and it wasn't as dark. I liked the smell at first but could smell self tanner in my sleep and the next day until I showered. I don't think there is any way of getting around that smell though.

reviews.review_title: LIFE SAVER FOR FAIR GIRLS WHO WANT A GLOW
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Life save for my senior prom, didn’t wanna look like a pale paisty but didn’t want to cook myself in a tanning bedlike my friends. Worth every dollar!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to use, mistake proof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I seriously love this self-tanner. I've been using it for 4 years and it's my go-to for the beginning of the summer when I don't have a real tan yet. Super easy to apply with the mitt. I'm really fair but this doesn't leave me looking orange after I wash it off after letting it develop for 8 hours. I apply it right before I go to bed, sleep in it and wash it off the next morning. It doesn't stain sheets or clothing and it doesn't feel sticky. It does however, have a fake tan smell. That scent is very much there but it goes away after a shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's ok. The color it leaves is nice, however it takes forever to dry.. like hours.. and I've always purchased the glove with it but even applied with the glove I still notice blochie marks over my body. I would rather use a lotion that gives gradual color. I've used self tanners for years, this is not the best but not the worst

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite!!! So natural and easy to use. It also doesn't smell bad like a lot of other self tanners. love love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I reaaaalllllyyyy wanted to love this but I can’t get over how bad it smells. The colour is pretty good, not too orange. I’ve showered three times since applying it and it still won’t come off. Which is great. I just cannot stand the smell. Makes me nauseous. Won’t be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A classic, go-to self tanner. It works beautifully and never causes streaks. I watched a YouTube video on how to prevent orange hands and feet (lotion, exfoliation) and I never have issues with orange hands or feet. It comes out as a mousse and I go a little heavy handed with it as I really like to make sure I cover everything and it gets as dark as the classic mousse will get. BTW, the dark 1hr mousse and clear stainless mousse work just as well!!! I have all three depending my needs (overnight tan, super quick tan, on-the-go tan under clothes) and I always use the mitts to apply. Each mitt lasts me quite a few applications.  The classic goes on easily and smells faintly of tanner. As it dries and works, it smells stronger. I wouldn't go out without washing it off so this tanner is what I use late at night so that it can tan my skin overnight. I've never ruined an outfit or pillow or sheets with St Tropez tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good but comes off streaky the color is pretty.  I try to rub all over but you miss a spot it’s very noticeable other than that it’s not a bad product .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good! I have tried quite a few self tanners this one is the best so far! No orange no streaks. Just make sure you exfoliate and put a moisturizer on your knees, elbows, feet, ankles, hands and wrists. Then keep moisturizing after you shower fornthe next few days to keep it longer. First time trying the mouse and I prefer to the lotion. Its drys faster and doesn’t feel heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very fair skinned with freckles and this tan made me look like I got back from the beach with an even, warm tone. People thought my tan was real! Highly recommend- and get the mitt!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very fair and enjoy a good tan. The first sunless tanner i purchased was this exact one. I enjoy this product a lot however because i am very fair with olive and yellow undertones this product tends to turn me slightly green. If you have a pinky undertone this product may be better for you. The smell isn’t too strong and it’s very easy to apply. Like all tanners do, it does turn any acne or dry patches a darker color and looks best when applied carefully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Simply the best. I was an avid fake bake flawless user but this looks more natural, streaks way less, and stays on twice as long. I’m pretty fair, red hair, and this makes me look so naturally tan I love it. I’ll never use anything else. It’s also subtle-I don’t look like Snooki after using it.  It just makes me look bronzed and healthy :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My daughter is very, very fair skinned.  After 6 months with no sun, she looks like a ghost!  This self-tanner gave her a beautiful tan.  Definitely buy the mitt.  I little goes a long way.  She had a few streaks on her shoulders, but I blame myself for doing this in a poorly lit bathroom, not the product.  Though this was pricey, I do see this lasting quite a while.  Very pleased and will absolutely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I REALLY want to love this. It’s so close! I am fair and don’t think it leaves an orangey color at all. I love the color. It just doesn’t last. If you even think about getting wet it’ll come off. And the transfer is awful. My entire right side tan is now on my white sheets. I want to use it again for the color but I just don’t know about it... if you want it for a night and minimally move this is great. Don’t go near water. & there is a fake tanning smell but it is very very minimal to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. As with every bronzer, make sure you exfoliate prior to using it. Then you will have amazing results that look as natural as it gets for fake tan. I get compliments all the time. Also, no nasty fake tan smell and no outbreaks, just an even tan. Love it. It also slowly fades instead of leaving patches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best self tanner ever! Nearly impossible to mess up, no streaks  and barely any dry time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using on my face and body for a few years now. I used to use Clarins but I enjoy the smell and the depth of color achieved in one application. Just make sure to exfoliate before any use. I ask recommend the self tanner mit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to product. Easy to apply, lasts several days (up to a week if you moisturize), and doesn't smell bad at all. :) I even recommended it to my mom in lieu of a spray tan and she LOVES it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: St Tropez Mousse is a good self tanner, friendly user with the green/brown shade when you apply. Smell ok, not as bad as most of the self tanner. Tanning color is brown, no orange on me. I apply 2 times in a week. Packaging is a good value. Much more than spray ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: j'aime beaucoup ce produit  il fait très naturel .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So natural looking. I’m Italian and I decided to stay out of the sun as much as possible but your girl needs her golden skin. It gives you that nice brown look rather than that Cheeto tone we all hate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gave me such a clean tan with minimal streaking, and went on really nicely. I wish the tan had lasted a little longer, but it was a really nice natural glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this self tanner! I always receive compliments on my tan thanks to this product lol! Nice colour and lasts a couple days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This tanner is the best thing for my pale, patchy skin when I need a quick glow for a special occasion. It's meant as an instant tanner product rather than a gradual one that you apply regularly. A warning - it looks really bad (translucent, almost grey) when you first put it on! The colour needs about 12 hours to become what you want. Definitely use the applicator mitt to avoid streaking, and let it dry for several hours before sleeping on light sheets or allowing your skin to get wet. The end result will only last for a day or two, but it's a gorgeous, natural-looking and totally worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I could write a love poem about this product. As a girl often referred to as Snow White and that people crowd around in pictures so that they look tanner, this is my new Holy Grail. The bronzer really helps you not miss a spot, and I feel like it being a mousse it what really makes it spread well and not streak. The mitt is a must also. Not only is the application flawless, but the color is so natural. My DAD even commented on how great the color was. I put this on before going to visit my sister in Miami and her friends were shocked that I wasn't the same color as the sand for once. HIGHLY recommended and SO worth the price.

reviews.review_title: By far the best self tanner!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I’ve tried every single self tanner out there and none even compare to this. It’s easy to apply, streak free but most importantly NOT ORANGE. It looks completely natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After some very orange years and trying every self tanner on the market, I embraced my paleness until I  came across this product. This tanner is so natural looking and completely mess free. Blends perfectly and fades subtlety. And no funky smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great self tanner. I’m a very pale person in the winter and I thought I’d try this to prep for Spring Break. My first time I definitely missed a spot or two but it went on super easy and I wasn’t streaky at all despite having no idea what I was doing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great spreadability. Very natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used a high end fake tanner before and I am so glad I chose this one. I have extremely fair and sensitive skin and am trying to prepare for a cruise to the Bahamas. (For reference I am shade 0.5 in Urban Decay All Night Foundation)  I used a trial size of this and fell in love. The mousse is so easy to work with. It dries fast, didn't transfer on anything and doesn't have a strong smell. My favorite part is one layer gives you a sun kissed tan with neutral undertones, but two layers makes you bronze. Very natural looking and user friendly. I would recommend the mitt, it makes a big difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After facing my first Boston winter, I decided to give this product a try. I used it for the first time last night and am so pleased with the results. After one use, I have developed a great base color that is not orange-y and completely even.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing, perfect bronze colour. Definitely get the mitt to go along though otherwise your hands will be brown forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is perfect for a tint darker than my skin tone. I love the way this product fades! It’s not splotchy at all, it fades perfectly (make sure you follow care instructions). Overall, I will be purchasing more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to self tanner. I use this on my face and body. I apply with a mitt for body and beauty blender for my face. I will never switch!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best fake tan ever and I have tried them all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. My sister recommended St.Tropez to me after both of us having extensive sun damage. It is so smooth, doesn’t go on streaky and leaves you with a natural tan glow. As a Florida native it’s the perfect solution for a safe tan. The tanning mitt is totally worth it as well for the prevention of lines as well as clean hands!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First time self tanner here. I heard/read nothing but great reviews about this brand. I followed the instructions to the letter. Exfoliated, moisturized dry areas and applied the tanner with mitt. Did so in the evening (6pm) and let fully dry before getting dressed. The next morning the color was quite dark. A bit orange (on my light olive skin) but not bad. There were some streaks/patches (expected as this was my first time ever) and a bit of a smell. There was no transfer to bed sheets or clothing. I showered around 10am and have lost ALL color. I'm not sure if I wasn't supposed to shower for a day or so. Seems odd and feels pointless now to have even used the tanner. I'm really disapointed but will give the tanner another chance and see how it goes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, very easy to use doesn't get splotchy and is a nice actual real looking tan. Not orange like most self tans, it gave me a olive toned color which looks much more realistic for my fair skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best tanning product I have used. I use the tanning mit ($6) and this product goes on evenly and streak free. It ends up saving money if you go to get spray tans. M

reviews.review_title: Works if you're willing to work
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works if you're willing to work: meaning you really must exfoliate all skin, put some moisturizer on knees, elbows, between toes and back hand, be mindful of bronzer to ensure you don't miss a spot, apply 4 hours before bed, try wearing loose old closes 20mins after apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Would highly recommend! Even tan and easy to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for years. I've tried other brands (organic and what not) But honestly nothing compares to this formula! I also tried the darker tan in the St Tropez range, but this one is by far the best. The mousse makes it easy to apply and it lasts for weeks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yep, I trusted this product for my tan before my wedding. I practiced a lot before that though! It's just a nice, natural looking tan. It goes on pretty easily. I apply at night, wear some old pjs and wash off in the shower in the morning. I highly recommend using the mitt for application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I will never use anything else.  It doesn't smell like most self tanners, it doesn't streak or make you orange.  I'm in love with this stuff

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found the how to use video extremely helpful.  My first self tanner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am new to tanning so this was a great start! I am a light/medium skin tone, and so I found this to be a little light on me. I really liked the colour of it though, it was very true to my natural tan colour, just lighter.

reviews.review_title: Dries Quick, Never Orange, Takes Some Practice
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After about five uses, I think I have the hang of this stuff. It definitely comes out as a fluffy mousse, and once you start applying you have to work fast. That being said, it doesn't take long (even for a novice like me) to master the application process, especially if you use a mitt. Some recommendations would be: 1. Exfoliate right before and probably for a couple days before if possible; 2. Don't shave your legs right before tanning; 3. Put moisturizer on knees, ankles, elbows, tops of feet and back of hands to minimize these areas getting too much product on them;  4. It dries fast, but the marker color will transfer so don't put anything precious on until after you've showered that off. This stuff is now part of my weekly schedule; every Sunday I shower and exfoliate and then apply this stuff all over doing one leg, one arm, front torso and back torso at a time. Day one is pretty intense, as far as color, but by day two or three it's just really nice and for me it lasts nearly all week. I plan out my wardrobe based on the level of tan I know I will be at that point in the week. It's just fun. Smell is minimal and the color is never orange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best self tanning product! It looks like an airbrush tan without the price, and the fragrance is great. I always get compliments whenever I use it. I often apply two coats for a deeper tan, but it's still more convenient and cheaper than going to a spa.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously, GET THIS PRODUCT. I have been on a mission to find a self tanner and I found the holy grail. Make sure you always purchase the mitt because it also changes the tan game. I love that this product is easy to apply. I start on my legs and work my way up my body.( & have my roommate do my back). You don’t have to be perfect just do t miss any spots. Only takes about 5-10 minutes to apply. Then I hit the hay and wake up with a beautiful tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Finally! I am in love. I have experimented with countless self tanning lotions. I usually have problems with orange and unnatural color, streaks, strong odor, and color transferring onto sheets or clothes. I have very light skin, so I wanted a lotion that wasn't gonna be too dark or too orange. This gave me a subtle olive color that was just a shade or two darker than my natural skin. The built-bronzer and mitt left me completely streak free. There doesn't seem to be any odor. AND I saw little to no color transfer onto my clothes or white sheets. I will definitely be buying this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product.  It doesn't make you orange, even if you apply 2-3 times a week. It just makes you. Another thing I love is a color change that happens when you apply the product so you can see spots you missed upon application.  I haven't had a problem with streaking, but use sparingly over thicker skin, like the knees or elbows because even with a moisturizer applied to those areas, they will look darker.

Very easy to use and gives natural looking results that last about a week. I prefer this over a spray tan because you get several applications for less than or about the same amount of money as one spray tan. When it comes off it doesn't get streaky like a spray tan does instead it just fades! I would highly recommend this product!

Best self-tanning product I have ever used!  Easy application (I used a mitt) and great natural tan color that lasted several days.  Did not wipe off on my clothes and did not have a bad smell like other products.  The mousse is easy to apply and see where it has been placed for even application. Well worth the price. Great tan with one  application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I applied this using the St Tropez application mitt last night after I had showered, exfoliated and moisturised. I woke up this morning looking like I had been at my cottage all weekend (this is a good thing, in case you're unsure).   St Tropez did not leave any streaks or an orange hue that some have complained about. That being said, I have an olive skin tone so my natural tan is more brown than orange (like some of my fairer skinned friends) so this might be why.  The only reason why I did not give this five stars is because I'm not big on the smell which has lingered. Despite this, it's a great product.
Amazing and natural looking tan! Even on my Casper white skin!
Very natural look! It just takes patience to apply and dry. I wish it took less time to dry. The tan itself only lasts a few days. Love this product though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best self tanner I've ever used! It is a mousse so the product doesn't go everywhere when you pump it out (ahem Josie Maran), you can see where the product goes instantly which makes for a perfect application every time. BUY THE MIT! It will change your life. I use this year round and have light olive skin tone. One 8oz bottle usually lasts me well over 6 months. I will use this product forever.  One caution, make sure the top is screwed on tightly if you're traveling with it. Mine opened a bit one time and made a huge mess.

I'm a super pale human - the slightest exposure to the sun turns me red and crispy. For that reason, I always wear 50+ sunscreen, but I wanna play sun kissed too! This product is life changing. For the first summer of my life, I can wear a bikini without blinding everyone at the beach! This mousse goes on streak free, and looks incredibly natural! I definitely recommend getting the mitt, and maybe watching a few beauty bloggers' tips on how to use the product before your first application. Also, it does feel a little sticky at first and does transfer onto clothing for the first hour or so. Regardless, this product is the easiest and most convincing self tanner I've found - I bought the mini bottle and it has lasted me several applications.

I am pretty pale as I don't get out in the sun much, and this self tanner gave me a nice color. Definitely not orange, and it didn't have any odor. I bought the ulta brand tanning mitt, and it works well for application. I didn't find it to be streaky at all. I will say for someone pale like me that you may need more than one application to get a real tan appearance.
Meeeeeeh I didn't like how it absorbed into my skin. I.felt sticky. Definatly got dark though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect light glow for my sister's wedding! I would do a few days before in case you wanted to do a second layer.  looked great on my hands, knees and ankles - no dark spots.  Did not rub off on my light bridesmaid's dress!

This is the best self-tanner I have ever used! It is so easy to apply with the mitten (you must buy this as well) The product gives you a BEAUTIFUL color and it is basically idiot proof. I normally get airbrushed as I am a bit lazy and generally end up with streaks from most self-tanners, but I have never had an issue with this foaming formula. I use it twice a week in light applications and I have a wonderful golden glow. The large sized bottle has lasted three months for me, which is surprising! Over all I would say this is a must have for those that want a golden glow but would like to avoid skin cancer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very hesitant to buy this tanner after reading some bad reviews. I decided to buy it anyway and I am SO happy I did. I should start off by saying I am VERY fair skin. I mean I wear the lightest foundations in every brand and sometimes they are too dark for me that's how white I am... Due to my colorless skin I have become dependent on self tanner and spray tans. The first thing I noticed about this tan was it smells good! Like I mentioned before I have used so many fake tanning products and I was always left with that gross smell. Second Is it goes on easy like you have time to rub it in before it dries and gets uneven like i found Vita Liberta did. Third is how little product you need to actually cover a surface. The color is instant and it is nice and natural. I did one application two days ago and I'm still so tan even after 1 shower and washing my face 3 times. I highly recommend this product and the applicator glove they work so well together. I think I have found my new favorite self tanner! :)
the color is nice. looks really natural and fades really pretty. I gave 4 out of 5 because it transferred onto my bedsheets.

I really like this product. I love using self tanners but have been getting pretty frustrated with streaks, and this is probably the only one I've found that I can apply to my whole body and not see those tacky lines. The mitt applicator definitely helps. It is a super subtle, sunkissed look. The smell is faint and I don't mind it. The only thing I can say is the exfloiating is crucial. I just got back from vacation and wanted to darken up before work my look so I was bad and applied it without exfoliating, and my face was all flakey and had pockets all over it. Not good. So definitely follow instructions and this product is great.

reviews.review_title: Natural looking tan for fair skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy this self tanner b/c its easy to apply & looks really good. The only downfall is the smell-its not very strong but I can smell it on me for about a day after washing it off. I would recommend this 100!
Without a doubt, the best self tanner you will ever use. Spend the money and purchase this product! It will not disappoint you....I promise :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best self tanner I have ever used! I already have a little bit of a tan to myself naturally being portuguese and in the sun, I tan very very easily. This stuff looks like I just came from the beach; not orange at all, it's so natural looking I love it! It blends very easily as well and I did not see any streaks or lines. The color doesn't fade that quickly but when it does fade it's all very natural looking and not patchy (as long as you exfoliate regularly). The only thing that isn't so great about this is that it came off on my clothes pretty easily, which is a pain but in the wash it comes out completely so not that big of a deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know why this doesn't have better reviews, but it is by far the only tanning product I've found that I thoroughly enjoy. I always get compliments on my tan after using this, and have managed to get so many uses out of one bottle. It never streak and never turns orange. Only complaint is the smell on the first day-- it's not HORRIBLE but it's definitely noticeable. My tan lasts for about a week with this product and I love it.

Honestly felt a little ripped off from this product. I did everything right, I exfoliated prior, left it on for over 8 hours. And when I woke up the next morning to wash off I was barely even 1 shade darker. I am a very fair skinned girl naturally, like usually the lightest shade of foundation in most brands, so I assumed this would be a good choice for me, as I didn't want to end up ridiculously fake dark or orange.. but this really didn't do much. And the 'slight' tan it did give completely disappeared within 2 days, and I don't even shower every day. Giving 2 stars because it didn't end up patchy or streaky and the slight colour change was actually a very natural looking skin tone, not orange whatsoever. Overall I think they have the natural looking tone right, but I just don't understand how this could work/ be dark enough for anyone if it hardly even made a difference on my super pale skin. Will be trying out the DARK mousse now, so fingers crossed!

reviews.review_title: st. tropaz products are the holy grail
reviews.review_text: I spent much of late teens and 20's in tanning beds. I can go back and slap myself now that these products are Wonders! My boy and I use the shower 3 minute tanner by same brand whenever we don't have time to wait doe the foam that changed all my skin to literally the tan arms I have over night!! I feel so my better knowing I look really tan and it orange as all. Perfect formula. Thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a pretty fair skinned girl and have used a TON of self tanniing products (gradual lotions, spray tans, airbrush tans, etc...) - you name it I've tried it.  Let me tell you, this stuff is legit!  It's seriously one of the BEST self tanners I've used.  Be sure to exfoliate beforehand and using a tanning mitt will make a world of difference.  Awesome product, will definitely use again!

reviews.review_title: Why did I ever pay for a spray tan?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! This stuff is amazing! I got the mitt to go with it and I've never been happier! I've tried some tanning lotions and sprays but this is the best quality tanning product I've been able to find. It goes on easily, does have a bit of a tanner smell but it's not terrible, continues to get darker as the day goes on (I usually put it on before bed on a Friday and shower around noon on Saturday) and can be used daily without getting orange! I've forgotten to exfoliate before and still had great results!

I'm new to self tanners but have been wanting to add some colour to my seemingly impossible to tan legs. The product went on very smoothly with the guide. I had the mitt to help spread and buff it out. It lasts at least a week and only needs a touch up every 4-5 days or so. Good value and great looking tan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this self tanner. The smell is good, it goes on smooth with the matching mitt. Make sure to follow the instructions to exfoliate and use mitt. I rushed it once and the results weren't as good. Once I stuck to the instructions, my tan was flawless every time. Using it weekly, It has lasted over 3 months- WAY cheaper than a spray tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: BUT I don't. I've been experimenting with this product for months now trying to make it work, and so I've come to this conclusion. I'm fair skinned, and while it does look natural in color, the streaks and patchy-ness do not look natural. No matter how well I exfoliate, this product ends up streaking and patching up in the weirdest places on my body, and I use the mitt. Not only that, but this isn't buildable. Once you use it, you have to wait for it to wash off of your body completely (which could take more than a couple of showers) before you can re-apply it or else it will build up on whatever is left of the old layer of self-tanner, and you will end up looking unnaturally darker in some places than in others. So you basically have to fade back to pale before you can tan, so it's not very consistent to say the least. Also, they claim it doesn't smell like self-tanner, but it totally does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good self tanner. The smell is minimal. I do suggest using the mit for the best application results. It really does make a difference in coverage and natural look. The product does get darker as the day goes on from application. It does have slight wash off in the shower, but much less than other products.

Most perfect tan in two hours. Lasts for days and days and looks SO natural! I have no need for sun bathing with this stuff. I love how it slightly shows up right away so you can tell if you need to go back over any spots. You'll definitely want to use a mitt when applying, however. It lasts a long time too, I have used it once a week or two since February and still have plenty left.

I was hesitant at first to buy this product, but I am so glad I did! It goes on so smoothly and streak free! The only problem I had was around my ankles and feet but after a good scrub in the shower it evened out. Looks natural and not orange! I will definitely be buying this product again!
I'm so pale and this is awesommeeeee!! Not orange at all! It's the perfect colour! Just be careful around the hands.. make sure to use lotion and get every spot!

Ok so im extremely pale and have always been self conscious about the fact that my veins pop right out of my skin. I was terrified to try this becAuse i thought it would come out super orange and obvious, however, i tried it and its amazing!!! The glow is so subtle but still makes me feel so sunkissed!!! Also makes your skin feel really moisturized somehow?? Getting your back is super hard as expected but just do it in a mirror

reviews.review_title: Amazing, natural, even on very fair skin
reviews.review_text: I am so impressed with this product. I am insanely fair. Like paper white. The color of this was SO natural, beautiful, no harsh orange tone whatsoever, not too dark. It was easy to apply, quick too. Blended in like a dream. It lasted me about 6 days. One thing that stands out about this is the way it wears off.. not patchy at all. It didn't make my skin feel extremely dry either, which is huge for a self tanner. Yes, for some of us $42 is a splurge but considering a spray tan in my area is about $30 and lasts a week, where as I can probably get through the entire summer with this one bottle, it is worth the price for sure. PS get the applicator mitt too.

reviews.review_title: Not my favorite but does the job!
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I had tried the express bronzing mouse and thought it was amazing! This one doesn't get me quite as tan and looks a bit more orange but it does the job. It also doesn't stay as long, I get maybe 4 good days out of one application (with exfoliating and moisturizing) where as I could get over a week with the express one! It doesn't fade in an ugly way though, for me, it looks like I have freckles which I actually find quite cute!
Gave amazing color and doesn't smell like other self tanners.
Totally recommend this product, but don't over apply as it will turn orange.

I used it with the mitt and it gave me streaks. I'm fair skinned and this made me look orange. Very un-natural tan. And it will stain your clothes and you will smell like self tanner even after you shower. Few days later you will see more obvious streaks and I had to exfoliate for days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was unsure about spending the money on this, so I read a lot of reviews and tips on it. I decided to buy it, since I needed a nice tan for a graduation dress. I did a test run about a month before, and it turned out great! It was very natural looking, and not at all orange. I bought the larger bottle, and have done two full body tans (I'm a pretty thick girl too), and there's still more than half of the bottle left.
